resources.string: In-Game Community need access to your microphone to record this voice message. To enable this, access to settings-applications-%@-permissions and activate Record Audio.
In-Game Community store and access information like photo on your phone. To enable this, access to settings-applications-%@-permissions and activate Storage.
Activate Record Audio permission for %@ immediately.
Sorry. The app version not support video.
